about_the_game:
Dark Inquisition is an action RPG dungeon crawler where you play as Inquisitors, wielding forbidden arts to purge the land of unholy inhabitants. Embark on a perilous journey through procedurally generated dungeons, confronting formidable foes, and uncovering ancient prophecies.

Inquisitors: Immerse yourself in a realm steeped in gothic horror and grim fantasy, where the line between righteousness and damnation blurs. Select your Inquisitor, each bearing the scars of countless battles against the demonic hordes, and delve into the ever-shifting depths of the Dark Portal.

Dungeons: Navigate through procedurally generated dungeons teeming with vile creatures, each more formidable than the last. Master a diverse arsenal of unique spells, unleashing devastating arcane power upon your foes. Utilize the spoils of your conquests to augment your Inquisitor's might, forging weapons and armor imbued with potent enchantments.

Bosses: As you descend into the abyss, confront formidable bosses, each a grotesque manifestation of demonic corruption. Test your mettle against these monstrous entities, employing both tactical prowess and arcane mastery to emerge victorious.

Spells & Equipment: Unravel the mysteries surrounding the demonic incursion, uncovering ancient spells and equipment. Forge alliances with enigmatic allies to make use of their abilities, their aid proving invaluable in your crusade against the darkness.

Dark Inquisition awaits, beckoning you into its depths. Will you succumb to the allure of the forbidden arts, or will you wield them with righteous fury, purging the land of its demonic scourge?
